channel.title: admin on Ben J. Ward
channel.description: Recent content in admin on Ben J. Ward

item.description: I’m a postdoctoral researcher and software developer in the Assembly & Algorithms (the A-Team) group, led by Bernardo Clavijo at the Earlham Institute in Norwich, England. Before arriving at The Earlham Institute, I earned my PhD in Population Genetics from The School of Environmental Sciences at The University of East Anglia, where I was supervised by Professor Cock van Oosterhout. My researched focused on the vital role recombination and hybridisation plays in the adaptive evolution of organisms to dynamic environments.
